Exalted Seed XPAC1 6Q Mythical Nature Unit — Anomaly B 2/2 2 {Shroud} {Summon} Place a counter on this card for each material it has. {Upkeep} Remove a counter from this card: Double its strength and toughness. {Death} Detach a material: this card survives with 1 life.
It begins in deep space warped by dark power.
Master of Lords XPAC1 4Q Outsider Unit - Warlock B 2/2 2 When an opposed Quanta Lord's effect is activated, gain +5/+5 and an ability.
A middling creature, easily dispatched by its superiors. It survives by thriving on their very overconfidence.
Kalamesian Pujari XPAC1 4Q Outsider Unit - Warlock B 3/2 2 {Flash} Exert: Purge a unit, then you can restore its original effects.
The humble priest, a scholar of virtuous healing and brutal sacrifice.
Tiny Sickle XPAC1 2Q Nature Science Unit - Insect Soldier GR 1/1 2 If you summon this card by evolving, it gains [Toxic] and [Swift]. {Evolve} Gain +2/+1.
There is no lasting hierarchy among the Verol; there is only the moment's duty. Even the lowest of the low won't hesitate.
Seventh Son XPAC1 6Q Mythical Nature Science Unit - Insect GR 4/5 2 {Summon} Attach 2 cards in your graveyard to this card. While material, you can detach this card: Shuffle it into your deck.

Offshoot XPAC1 2Q Nature Science Support GR 3 Copy a material attached to a friendly card.

Architect's Legacy XPAC1 5Q Mythical Nature Science Relic GR 0 Your tokens have the effect... "{Evolve} Gain +1/+1, increased to +2/+2 if this card has stat bonuses." Exert a relic: Create a Drone token and attach it to a unit.
"You must be strong for when the others arrive. To become strong, you must evolve." —Lenneth Kars Drone
Zao, the Weaver XPAC1 6Q Mythical Neutral Unit - Human Anomaly
0/10 2 Has [Shroud] while you have other friendly units. When you summon a friendly unit, give a different friendly unit +2/0 or 0/+2.
He became the guiding hand of Kalamesh's third colony. It has long since declared independance.

8/4 2 Remove an ability from all enemy units. Give a friendly unit [Toxic] for each ability removed.
Sailed to the Searing Seas to find new life for himself. Found new life in himself.
